overview:
Hibiscus Technology Solutions Pvt Ltd; Incorporated in May 2008, we have been growing steadily ever since, constantly learning, evolving, ideating and innovating. Our focus has been around building technologies for startups, providing extended mobile development services to other software establishments or to be a complete technology partner for non IT business units. Our Values: > Partnering with customer > Encouraging startups > Promoting ideas & innovation > Niche technology Service provider

We treat our customers like our partners and believe customer’s success is our success. We stretch ourselves to help our customers, beyond our contracts. We expertise in the following technologies: Mobile Application Development - iPhone Apps
Android Apps Palm WebOS
Symbian Blackberry

Web Development Ruby On Rails PHP JAVA .NET

Web 2.0 Facebook Apps Social Apps Mashups NoSQL DBs

Cloud SAAS Sales Force.com EC2/S3 Mobile Access to the Cloud

For more information you can log onto “www.hibiscustech.com”
